items.title: Here’s what Chevron CEO Mike Wirth thinks about the hit TV show ‘Landman’
items.description: "And so, you know, there's certain aspects of it that are that are accurate and others that are probably just a touch exaggerated."

items.title: A workforce management giant will lay off 1,750 employees to make way for AI
items.description: Nearly 8.5% of staffers will be affected, joining the ranks of Salesforce and Klarna in paving a new way of work.

items.title: She helped get Black-owned brands on store shelves. Even as the tide turns against DEI, she’s determined to keep them there
items.description: Target's DEI pivot was received the worst by consumers of any company's.

items.title: The CEOs who spend $8 million on a Super Bowl ad
The company behind Shaq’s Super Bowl party says it solved the industry’s ‘dirty secret’ and will make $15 million from 3 events
items.description: Medium Rare hosts Shaq’s Fun House, Guy’s Flavortown Tailgate, and SI The Party, expecting tens of thousands of fans this weekend.
